## PackageResource.getAuditTrail() method

Retrieves audit details about a package (transaction). The Audit Trail is embedded directly in the package, and can be viewed any time.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAuditTrail(packageId: string): Promise<ExportedAuditTrail>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ExportedAuditTrail](./onespan-sign-node.exportedaudittrail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The audit trail of the package.

## Remarks

- [REST API documentation (OneSpan)](https://community.onespan.com/products/onespan-sign/sandbox#/Packages/api.packages._packageId.audit.get)
